languages.text: "Эта обитель управлялась Адептус Механикус с момента основания колонии. Священный реактор, оберегаемый тамошними монахами, снабжает энергией всю планету. Большего сообщить я не могу — это запретное место, которое даже мне было позволено посетить лишь раз".

"The cenobium has been run by the Adeptus Mechanicus ever since the colony was founded. The sacred reactor guarded by its priests powers the entire planet. I can say no more. It is a forbidden place that even I have only been allowed to visit once before."
languages.original_text: "Эта обитель управлялась Адептус Механикус с момента основания колонии. Священный реактор, оберегаемый тамошними монахами, снабжает энергией всю планету. Большего сообщить я не могу — это запретное место, которое даже мне было позволено посетить лишь раз".

traits.locale_text: "The monastery has been run by the Adeptus Mechanicus ever since the colony was founded. The sacred reactor guarded by its monks is powering the entire planet. I can say no more. It's a forbidden place which even I have only been allowed to visit once."

"The monastery has been run by the Adeptus Mechanicus ever since the colony was founded. The sacred reactor guarded by its monks is powering the entire planet. I can say no more. It's a forbidden place which even I have only been allowed to visit once."

"The cenobium has been run by the Adeptus Mechanicus ever since the colony was founded. The sacred reactor guarded by its monks is powering the entire planet. I can say no more. It's a forbidden place where even I have only once been allowed to visit."

"The cenobium has been run by the Adeptus Mechanicus ever since the colony was founded. The sacred reactor guarded by its monks is powering the entire planet. I can say no more. It's a forbidden place where even I have only once been allowed to visit."

"The cenobium has been run by the Adeptus Mechanicus ever since the colony was founded. The sacred reactor guarded by its monks powers the entire planet. I can say no more. It is a forbidden place that even I have only been allowed to visit once before."

"The cenobium has been run by the Adeptus Mechanicus ever since the colony was founded. The sacred reactor guarded by its monks powers the entire planet. I can say no more. It is a forbidden place that even I have only been allowed to visit once before."

languages.text: "Das Cenobium wird seit Gründung der Kolonie vom Adeptus Mechanicus geleitet. Der heilige Reaktor, der von seinen Priestern bewacht wird, versorgt den gesamten Planeten. Mehr kann ich nicht sagen. Es ist ein verbotener Ort, selbst ich durfte ihn erst einmal besuchen."
languages.original_text: "The cenobium has been run by the Adeptus Mechanicus ever since the colony was founded. The sacred reactor guarded by its priests powers the entire planet. I can say no more. It is a forbidden place that even I have only been allowed to visit once before."

traits.locale_text: "Das Cenobium wird seit Gründung der Kolonie vom Adeptus Mechanicus geleitet. Der heilige Reaktor, der von seinen Mönchen bewacht wird, versorgt den gesamten Planeten mit Strom. Mehr kann ich nicht sagen. Es ist ein verbotener Ort, selbst ich durfte ihn nur ein einziges Mal besuchen."

languages.text: « Le Cenobium est dirigé par l'Adeptus Mechanicus depuis la fondation de la colonie. Le réacteur sacré gardé par ses prêtres alimente la planète tout entière. Je n'en sais pas plus. C'est un endroit interdit où même moi, je n'ai eu le droit de me rendre qu'une seule fois. »
languages.original_text: "The cenobium has been run by the Adeptus Mechanicus ever since the colony was founded. The sacred reactor guarded by its priests powers the entire planet. I can say no more. It is a forbidden place that even I have only been allowed to visit once before."

traits.locale_text: « Le Cenobium est dirigé par l'Adeptus Mechanicus depuis la fondation de la colonie. Le réacteur sacré gardé par ses moines alimente la planète tout entière. Je n'en sais pas plus. C'est un endroit interdit où même moi, je n'ai eu le droit de me rendre qu'une seule fois. »

languages.text: “自从殖民地建立以来，那间修道院就一直由机械修会负责管理。那里的神甫负责守护神圣的反应堆，为整颗行星提供能量。更多事情恐怕我就不清楚了，那里是片禁地，就连我之前也只参观过一次。”
languages.original_text: "The cenobium has been run by the Adeptus Mechanicus ever since the colony was founded. The sacred reactor guarded by its priests powers the entire planet. I can say no more. It is a forbidden place that even I have only been allowed to visit once before."

traits.locale_text: “自从殖民地建立以来，那间修道院就一直由机械修会负责管理。那里的僧侣负责守护神圣的反应堆，为整颗行星提供能量。更多事情恐怕我就不清楚了，那里是片禁地，就连我也只参观过一次。”

languages.text: 「連生体はコロニーができて以来、帝国技術局が運営してきた。司祭たちが守る神聖なリアクターが、この惑星全体に電力を供給している。言えることはここまで。私でさえ一度しか訪れることを許されなかった禁断の場所だ」
languages.original_text: "The cenobium has been run by the Adeptus Mechanicus ever since the colony was founded. The sacred reactor guarded by its priests powers the entire planet. I can say no more. It is a forbidden place that even I have only been allowed to visit once before."

traits.locale_text: 「連生体はコロニーができて以来、帝国技術局が運営してきた。修道士が守る神聖なリアクターが、この惑星全体に電力を供給している。言えることはここまで。私でさえ一度しか訪れることを許されなかった禁断の場所だ」

languages.text: «El Cenobio ha sido dirigido por el Adeptus Mechanicus desde que se fundó la colonia. El reactor sagrado custodiado por sus sacerdotes suministra energía a todo el planeta. No puedo decir más. Es un lugar prohibido que incluso yo solo he podido visitar una vez».
languages.original_text: "The cenobium has been run by the Adeptus Mechanicus ever since the colony was founded. The sacred reactor guarded by its priests powers the entire planet. I can say no more. It is a forbidden place that even I have only been allowed to visit once before."

traits.locale_text: «El Cenobio ha sido dirigido por el Adeptus Mechanicus desde que se fundó la colonia. El reactor sagrado custodiado por sus monjes suministra energía a todo el planeta. No puedo decir más. Es un lugar prohibido que incluso yo solo he podido visitar una vez».

languages.text: "Koloninin kurulmasından bu yana senobiyumu Adeptus Mechanicus yönetmiştir. Rahiplerin koruduğu kutsal reaktör, tüm gezegene güç sağlar. Daha fazlasını anlatamam. Orası, benim bile evvelde sadece bir kez ziyaret etmeme izin verilen, yasaklı bir yerdir."
languages.original_text: "The cenobium has been run by the Adeptus Mechanicus ever since the colony was founded. The sacred reactor guarded by its priests powers the entire planet. I can say no more. It is a forbidden place that even I have only been allowed to visit once before."

traits.locale_text: "Koloninin kurulmasından bu yana senobiyumu Adeptus Mechanicus yönetmiştir. Rahiplerin koruduğu kutsal reaktör, tüm gezegene güç sağlar. Daha fazlasını anlatamam. Orası, benim bile evvelde sadece bir kez ziyaret etmeme izin verilen, yasaklı bir yerdir."
